experience.title: Controls Design Internship
experience.description: â€¢ Investigated and Designed an Active Suspension Control system for better Ride and Handling of a car when it encounters uneven road disturbancesâ€¢ Tested the Quarter car model developed in MATLAB & Simulink with various road input simulations using a random road input signal and a controller â€¢ Employed PID and LQR Controller to decrease the sprung mass displacement and reduced road disturbance w.r.t a passive suspensionâ€¢ Enhanced the Energy Regeneration capacity by integrating a Mode controlled regeneration system with an Electromagnetic actuator & battery circuit
